title: Broken result handling

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
Revealed by #5080 

```
======================================================================
1517ERROR: datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_clone.test_invalid_args
1518----------------------------------------------------------------------
1519Traceback (most recent call last):
1520  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
1521    self.test(*self.arg)
1522  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 750, in _wrap_with_tempfile
1523    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
1524  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 750, in _wrap_with_tempfile
1525    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
1526  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 750, in _wrap_with_tempfile
1527    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
1528  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\core\distributed\tests\test_clone.py", line 98, in test_invalid_args
1529    res = clone('Zoidberg', path='ssh://mars:Zoidberg', on_failure='ignore')
1530  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 495, in eval_func
1531    return return_func(generator_func)(*args, **kwargs)
1532  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 483, in return_func
1533    results = list(results)
1534  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 414, in generator_func
1535    allkwargs):
1536  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 597, in _process_results
1537    path = path.replace('%', '%%')
1538TypeError: replace() takes 2 positional arguments but 3 were given
1539
1540
```

Replicates in `maint` and `master` on a real win10 box.

Reason `Path` instance instead of an expected `str`:

```
592                     msg = msg[0]
593                 if 'path' in res:
594                     path = res['path']
595                     if msgargs:
596                         # we will pass the msg for %-polation, so % should be doubled
597  ->                     path = path.replace('%', '%%')
598                     msg = '{} [{}({})]'.format(
599                         msg, res['action'], path)
600                 if msgargs:
601                     # support string expansion of logging to avoid runtime cost
602                     try:
(Pdb) type(path)
<class 'pathlib.WindowsPath'>
```

Given that we should become resilient to `Path` everywhere, it seems like an explicit type conversion is a good fix.
